## About


Currently, I'm a PhD student at the University of Toronto, supervised by [Roger Grosse](https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~rgrosse/), where I'm using influence functions to investigate how LLMs generalize.

Before that I was part of the founding team at UK's AI Safety Institute---I helped scale the organisation, and started our post-training team. Before that I worked at the [Center for AI Safety](https://www.safe.ai/), was a research intern at [UC Berkeley](https://humancompatible.ai/), studied LLM generalization under [Owain Evans](https://owainevans.github.io/) and completed my CS undergrad at the [University of Cambridge](https://www.undergraduate.study.cam.ac.uk/courses/computer-science).
